meanings.sent1: The small town was newsless, with nothing exciting happening.
meanings.sent2: The newspaper was newsless today, with no new stories to report.
meanings.sent3: The newsless day made the reporter feel like a detective without a mystery to solve.
meanings.sent4: Her mind felt newsless, like a library without any books.
meanings.sent5: The newsless atmosphere in the room was suffocating, as if all the information had vanished.

meanings.sent1: The website was newsless, only showing old articles.
meanings.sent2: The magazine was newsless this month, filled with advertisements instead of stories.
meanings.sent3: The newsless broadcast made the viewers switch channels in search of something interesting.
meanings.sent4: His expression was newsless, revealing nothing about his thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The newsless silence in the room was deafening, as if all the important updates had disappeared.
